thread.title: General Kelly will decide on Kushner's security clearance: Trump

title: General Kelly will decide on Kushner's security clearance: Trump
text:
General Kelly will decide on Kushner's security clearance: Trump Friday, February 23, 2018 - 01:20 
President Donald Trump said on Friday that White House chief of staff John Kelly will decide whether Trump son-in-law and top adviser Jared Kushner gets a security clearance. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).   
President Donald Trump said on Friday that White House chief of staff John Kelly will decide whether Trump son-in-law and top adviser Jared Kushner gets a security clearance. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).  //reut.rs/2EN8AzB
